summary: Full Stack Developer specialized in high-performance web applications and AI automation. Background in algorithmic data analysis and mathematical modeling.
about: Full Stack Developer and Data Analyst with over 6 years of experience. I specialize in building scalable web applications and implementing AI-driven automation. I combine strong foundational knowledge in algorithms with a modern, high-performance stack (React, Node.js, Python). I am constantly integrating State-of-the-Art AI tools into my workflow to optimize code quality and efficiency. Open to remote challenges.

details: React, TypeScript, Vite, Tailwind CSS, Framer Motion
Node.js, PostgreSQL, Supabase, SQL, Stripe, Cloudflare Stream
Workflow Optimization with LLMs (Claude, Gemini, Copilot)
C, C++, Java, PHP, Data Structures

experience.description: Architected and manage a VOD platform with complex subscription systems. Focused on performance optimization and rapid feature deployment.
experience.stack: React, TypeScript, Vite, Tailwind CSS, PostgreSQL, Stripe, Resend.

experience.description: Engineered a desktop application for creating and visualizing Game Theory (GTO) ranges. Implemented a visual grid editor with weighted decision logic (mixed strategies 70/30%) and a real-time assistant using RNG.
experience.stack: Python, Tkinter (GUI), JSON, Algorithmic Logic, RNG.

experience.description: Developed custom Python solutions for automation. Built and trained a Neural Network for Optical Character Recognition (OCR) to automate decision-making based on visual data.
Designed a mathematical bankroll management system using solvers and multi-terabyte databases to predict Equity, EV, and risk based on statistical probability.
experience.stack: SQL, Big Data, Statistics & Probability, Solvers.
